text: Fernando Daniel (Estarreja, May 11, 1996) is a Portuguese singer and songwriter who became known by participating in Factor X Portugal and winning the 4th.1st edition of the talent show The Voice Portugal. Along with Diogo Pi√ßarra, he is the former contestant on Portuguese talent shows held in the 21st century who has achieved the most commercial success. In 2017, he began his career, releasing his first single, "Espera", on July 11 of that same year.
title: Fernando Daniel
